@ Quink666

You tend to come here and call me names , rather than ask for help jeeez. But I'm Still gonna try to help You here.

1/ Turn Of Ur Antivirus
2/ Install The Game
3/ Copy all Cracked Contents From The SKIDROW Folder

buddha.dll
CloakNTEngine.dll
SKIDROW.ini
steam_api.dll
Steamclient.dll

And Copy Them Over to the game's Installation Path, Replacing/Ovewriting The Original Files.

4/ Add Both dh_2013.exe and buddha.dll To Your antivirus Exclusion/Trusted List.
5/ Add dh_2013.exe To Your Firewall Blocklist.
6/ Turn On your Antivirus As Normal and Start The Game.

Ok, just a thought on all of these problems with crashing; go into your "Saved Games" folder, then go into the "Dangerous Hunts 2013" folder & double click the config file, then choose wordPad to open the file. I'm thinking that your res may be too high, or low; change it to suit your screen type, ie: Standard 4:3, or Widescreen 16:9 etc, might work, cheers.
